audio_description: Bismillah ir-Rahman ir-Rahim. Friends, Sindhi Biryani is traditionally made with sela rice, but I know my viewers use basmati rice. So in this video, I'm using basmati rice. I’ve taken 3 glasses, which weigh around 1 kg. I’ll tell you later how many people this serves. First, let's wash the rice.

audio_description: Now let’s check it. Bismillah ir-Rahman ir-Rahim.

MashaAllah, this biryani turned out absolutely delicious. The spices are mild, but if you prefer it spicier, you can increase the quantity, especially red chili. But in my opinion, this is a perfectly balanced biryani. If you liked this recipe, please give it a like and share with your friends.
